# Do you need help choosing something to eat?

Answer a few quick questions and quickly find meal recommendations to suite your specific needs!

Results are generated based on data obtained from the U.S. Department of Agriculture (USDA) Food and Nutrient Database for Dietary Studies (FNDDS) [databases](https://www.ars.usda.gov/northeast-area/beltsville-md-bhnrc/beltsville-human-nutrition-research-center/food-surveys-research-group/docs/fndds-download-databases/).
